item.title: Page Templates
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
The Innov8ative Theme has the following templates:
Archive template
Blog template
Category template
The Category template is not an actual template that you choose in your editor. It is the default template that is used when someone views a specific category. It is an image driven template to compliment this recipe driven theme.

item.title: Page Layouts
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Below is a list of 6 post/page layouts that come with the Genesis theme framework:
  • Content/Sidebar
  • Sidebar/Content
  • Content/Sidebar/Sidebar
  • Sidebar/Sidebar/Content
  • Sidebar/Content/Sidebar
  • Full Width Content

item.title: About
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Innov8tive is a Child Theme for the Genesis Framework.  This theme was created to satisfy the appetite of the foodie bloggers.  Here are some features we think the foodies will like:
  • Featured Recipe Slider
  • Custom Category Page Template to highlight recipe photos for reader category searching
  • Beautifully highlights an abundance of photos on homepage
  • Mobile Responsive
  • Pairs with Easy Recipe Plugin for printable recipes and SEO friendliness
One of the great features of Innov8tive is it's built in template for categories. Anyone who visits a foodie blog is looking for recipe ideas and they want to quickly look at a category and see beautiful pictures of all the recipe options for that specific category along with the post title.   Innov8tive provides just that.  It's a recipe hunter's dream!

item.title: Mobile Menu for Responsive
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: The Innov8tive theme has incorporated a 3rd navigation menu that only displays on mobile devices.  It actually replaces the primary and secondary navigation on mobile devices with a viewing width of less than 600px (small tablets, iphones, small cell phones).  For a better understanding of how this works please view this demo site on the StudioPress responsive design tool: http://www.studiopress.com/responsive/?innov8tive.eightcrazydesigns.com Be sure to set up your mobile menu through your dashboard. When setting it up rethink your navigation in a way that simplifies it for mobile viewing. Create a menu and then select that menu as your choice for the "mobile Navigation Menu" option under the "Theme Locations" area of the Menu page of your Dashboard.

item.title: Recipe Plugins
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: This demo site demonstrates the use of two different Recipe Plugins ReciPress & Easy Recipe ReciPress A limited version of ReciPress is available absolutely free in the WordPress Plugin Repository, but if you’re looking for even more functionality and upgraded support then you’ll want to take advantage of the nicely priced Pro version that is coming soon. You can view how it works with the demo here: http://www.innov8tive.eightcrazydesigns.com/couscous-with-rustic-veggies/ Easy Recipe The Innov8tive Theme Demo has incorporated the Easy Recipe Plugin. This plugin provides a printable recipe option for readers and also increases the SEO friendliness of the recipe. This is a great plugin option for those who will choose to use the Innov8tive Theme for a sight that’s content is food and recipe driven. Cut and paste your recipe into your blog and EasyRecipe does the rest. No more filling in the blanks one ingredient at a time. You can view how it works with the demo here: http://www.innov8tive.eightcrazydesigns.com/simple-seafood-linguine/ **Please note that StudioPress & EightCrazy Designs do NOT offer support for these plugins. Any questions or concerns about how these plugins function will need to be handled on the plugin support forums: Easy Recipe Support Forums ReciPress Support Forums
